skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: training phono
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to the world of speech therapy.

We have prepared for you a set of exercises, based on practices applied by professionals in the field.
We have exercises and tips that will help you take care of your voice and hearing. In order to keep your communication always accurate.

Our intention is to help them overcome the barrier that exists in society, which excludes people because they are different.
We want everyone to have access to information and intimacy with technology, in a simple and cheerful way.

This project has a partnership with the Jô Clemente Institute, which is a pioneer in the inclusion of people with intellectual disabilities in society. The IJC has been fighting for the rights of people with disabilities for more than 50 years and has two of its values respect for differences and Innovation and constant improvement.

All activities, exercises and tips were elaborated by the professional speech therapist, Susineide de Abreu Barros. Who works at IJC and collaborated with his experience and dedication, so that people increasingly have contact with technology in a more humane way.

IMPORTANT WARNING:
The information in this Skill, is provided for informational and educational purposes only. They are not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor for medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

If you identify with the cause, and want to collaborate with your experience too, you are invited to join us.


Hug from Rafex_Pipoca!
